website_summaries.verdict: This cross-body model is convenient to carry and available in a rainbow of trim colors.
pros: The cross-body strap on this bag adjusts from 29 to 58 inches, making it convenient to carry
An outside pocket to stash keys or tickets adds to the convenience
With eight color options, this bag is versatile when it comes to appearance
cons: At only 8-inches wide, “messenger bag” is a misnomer for this small purse

customer_reviews.title: People were stopping us to ask about the purse.
customer_reviews.text: This bag was just what we needed for a local music festival here at an NFL stadium -- made getting through the lines super easy. It is not very large, but perfect size for glasses case (2), small makeup bag, phone and keys. If you need rain gear, jacket or blanket - you'll want a bigger bag - this is strictly a small travel purse. Front pocket made getting to phone or event ticket easy as rest of bag was tightly packed. People were stopping my friend and I to ask where we got them.
customer_reviews.author: sharonda n hampton

customer_reviews.title: the outside pocket is a nice feature. if you need a decent plastic purse ...
customer_reviews.text: plastic is plastic when it comes to bags, but being required in so many sports venues, one is needed. this one is thicker than i anticipated which is a plus, and a decent size to hold a few things. the outside pocket is a nice feature. if you need a decent plastic purse for sporting events, and don't plan on filling it with everything but the kitchen sink, this is a nice buy.
customer_reviews.author: DCC

customer_reviews.title: Great clear purse for passing security measures
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for an outdoor event in DC last January. It held the following - two small sandwiches, maps, subway card, Kleenex, sunscreen, cell phone, a power pack, two 8 oz water bottles and a flattened, mostly gone roll of toilet paper. I was not comfortable keeping visible money, ID, or a cc in it so those things I kept in an inside coat pocket. It is strong, and allows your hands to be free. Totally recommend this if you need a clear small purse for security clearance reasons. It's not big enough or private enough for me except for special events though
customer_reviews.author: lady with cello

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This bag is smaller than I thought it would be, but it holds what I need - two small wallet pouches (one with credit cards/cash, one with makeup), eyeglasses, and keys, with a little room to spare . My larger cell phone with case fits perfectly in the outside velcro pocket. No trouble with security at the NFL game I just attended. Not as roomy as the handheld type of clear bags, but I hate carrying those, plus they don't close. Sturdy, thick plastic. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: PAL

customer_reviews.title: Good for new NFL stadium rules
customer_reviews.text: I got this because I was going to a game in an NFL stadium and had to have a clear bag. I wanted the over the shoulder strap so I could be hands free! I do wish it was just a tad bit wider, but I was able to fit my phone, keys, game ticket, hand sanitizer, and a small clutch. Having a separate smaller pouch in front was also convenient for storing items I would want to grab quickly.
customer_reviews.author: MMB504

customer_reviews.title: Worked like a charm.
customer_reviews.text: This bag was perfect for a concert attended in NFL stadium. I fit a rain poncho, small wallet, sunglasses, and small pair of binoculars in main zippered space, and cell phone in outside velcro pocket. The strap was easy to adjust. In response to reviews commenting on the strap ripping: The part of strap that attaches to bag was reinforced with extra plastic and seems to be sewed quite well. If it fails I will update my review.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Moon

customer_reviews.title: Game Day Bag
customer_reviews.text: I don't particularly WANT to carry a clear bag, but with the new stadium rules for SEC football games, it is a necessary new normal. On game days, I like a crossbody bag so I don't have to mess with a purse on one shoulder or in my hand. It's not a cute look, but is what it is. This one meets the size requirements and has a good bit of space. A small umbrella, poncho, wallet, etc would fit in the main compartment. The front pocket is great for a phone & tickets - closes with velcro. The strap is adjustable to whatever length you like. It's made of decent enough materials and should last. Go Dawgs!
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: False Advertising
customer_reviews.text: The bag arrived smashed and the hard plastic is so stiff it won't expand to the shape shown online. The bag is awkwardly too big to pair with a cute concert outfit and it's made of the cheapest materials. The bag pictured on the model looks smaller than it is on my real body so the false advertising is awful. Incredibly disappointed, especially after believing customer reviews that claim it's a good bag. Save your money and pick a different bag!!
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for NFL Games
customer_reviews.text: We went to a Tampa Bay Bucs game last weekend and I purchased this bag to store our phones, wallets, etc and it worked great. The smaller pocket in the front with Velcro closure worked awesome! It is the perfect size and fit a heck of a lot of stuff. The strap can be worn across the body but I put it on my shoulder and it was fine. Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Tanguay

customer_reviews.title: It was the perfect size for a smaller wallet which contained my ID
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag to take to a stadium concert. It was the perfect size for a smaller wallet which contained my ID, credit cards and cash. All my other necessities fit perfectly as well. My iPhone, spare charger, charging cable, small lotion bottle and of course lipstick. Yes a girl needs to be prepared! The outside small velcro pocket was perfect for my lipstick. Easy access and no need to open the main zipper compartment. Well made and perfect for those stadium concerts or sporting events. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: SandyCapri

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy plastic bag
customer_reviews.text: While I like that the plastic is really sturdy there is also no give. I can’t tell if it will break in overtime. But currently it is very hard and sturdy. This isn’t bad but cause it feels like it will hold up for a long time, I just wish it was a little more pliable for comfort. Great for stadiums that require a clear bag as well as other places. It’s almost too big! Thought it would be a smaller crossbody but could hold probably two water bottles inside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It will do.
customer_reviews.text: Product as discribed. Seems to be a great quality. Only time will tell and daily use for durability. It’s very small. But it will work for its purpose. Which is everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Schultz

customer_reviews.title: The perfect sports bag
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size. I have worked the Phoenix Open this week, and I could leave this on my shoulder the entire work shift (all day) with no problems. It fits NBA, NFL, MLB, and PGA requirements and is still big enough to hold all my “stuff”. Perfect size and price! I also had people ask where I got it.... Thanks, Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: IAAZ

customer_reviews.title: Size NOT EXACTLY as described
customer_reviews.text: The main compartment is not 3" deep. The main plus the smaller outside compartment are MAYBE 2 1/2". The outside compartment is a great cell phone size. But my eyeglass case didn't fit well in the main compartment and it cracked my cell phone screen protector. I bought this for NFL stadium rules -- the big bags that are the max stadium size seem too big and I wanted a cross body. This would be much better if the main compartment was the full 3" deep PLUS the outside compartment.
customer_reviews.author: Justamom

customer_reviews.title: The price is right
customer_reviews.text: I bought this purse because I have a couple of events coming up only allow clear purses. Lame I know but sadly that is the world we live in. I read the other negative reviews and I saw what they saw. But, overall this purse will serve the purpose I need it to serve. Its comfortable and small enough and large enough all in one. I would recommend this purse to anyone who needs a cheap clear purse for an evening.
customer_reviews.author: DOT

customer_reviews.title: Plastic-yet Sturday
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this purse to attend a concert. I like that the plastic is really sturdy, and won't tear easily. Trimmed it black it will go with everything, hold my phone, keys, and possibly a funky 1950's rain bonnet that I own in case it looks like rain at an outdoor venue. I'd recommend it as a clear bag option.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey V. Hornung

customer_reviews.title: Great for stadium events
customer_reviews.text: I have used it 2-3 times now with no problems. Great size and shape to wear to a stadium event. There are loose threads and the quality could be improved, but it does what it is designed to do. This would be a horrible purchase if I wanted to use this as a regular purse. It will hold phone, chapstick, tickets, keys, money, small treats, small notebook, pencil, pen etc. I like the small area in the front for phone and chapstick. I have worn it cross-body and just over the shoulder. This bag is priced right.
customer_reviews.author: Florida customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Concerts!
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for attending a concert for my birthday. Small enough to not even know it it there, but large enough to hold all of my essential items. Also, it rained and kept my phone protected.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley_Marie

customer_reviews.title: Great for Concerts
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to bring to a concert I was going to, in hopes that I could avoid spending too long at bag check. It worked great for that! I was even able to fit two water bottles inside along with my wallet, phone, etc., since the venue allowed you to bring sealed water bottles in. I like that it has the separate front compartment so that I could put my phone or wallet in there to keep it separate from the water if need be. Would recommend for events like concerts and games, when you want a larger bag than a wristlet, but want to breeze through bag check.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan J

customer_reviews.title: For what it was it was good...
customer_reviews.text: I only got this to take to a concert...got it fine was able to put in everything I needed to carry. Very light weight and I liked how it was water proof. That being said I would never use it on a daily basis but was very good for what it was.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Willey

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Found out 2 days before attending a pro football game that I needed a clear bag. Hit Amazon immediately, 2 days later, like literally 5 minutes before I had to leave for the game, it was delivered, and it's perfect. Perfect size -- not too big, not too small. Cute little side pocket, adjustable strap. Every other woman at the stadium was carrying her clear bag -- I was hands free. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: rascalfishy

customer_reviews.title: Came used
customer_reviews.text: I noticed a few others ran into this same issue. When I received the bag, it appears to have already been used... not as bad as the girl who had lipstick and crumbs in hers, but mine did come slightly scuffed up and dirty. It's only for one or two events so I don't care as much, but just a warning to anyone looking to get a ~new~ bag. Also, it's a little smaller than I thought, the bag doesn't expand open too wide. Good luck!
customer_reviews.author: CanneH

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: This bag was great for the NFL game I attended! I was nervous because it is the first time I abided by the new clear bag policy. This crossbody was comfortable and just big enough for my wallet, keys, gum, phone and chapstick. It’s not very big but it’s enough space for essentials. It was good quality and I will definitely use it again. It’s not “stylish” if your going to a cute look but for the price it was a great casual bag. I would recommend it! PS it was accepted for the clear bag policy and game I attended. You won’t be disappointed for the price!
customer_reviews.author: NatalieM

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect for those events that enforce the NFL clear bag ...
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect for those events that enforce the NFL clear bag policy. Small enough to not get in the way but large enough for all your essentials: keys wallet, phone, sunglasses. Plus an extra pocket on the front for your ticket and lip gloss! The adjustable strap makes it work for anyone. Adjust the strap, sling it on and you are hands-free for clapping, cheering, high-fiving, eating with no worry of where your purse is!!! Go Team!!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Halvarson

customer_reviews.title: Was very sturdy plastic. I had it for working in a ...
customer_reviews.text: Was very sturdy plastic. I had it for working in a dept store. The zipper broke though after a while. I also didn't like how the velcro on the side pocket would stick to everything except the top of the pocket. It sure stuck to my shirts and snagged them. Overall a good choice in clear bags that holds a lot of stuff, just be careful how you use the zipper.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Buy it for events!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag for a concert that was implementing the NFL’s clear bag policy. It was large enough to hold my iPhone max, a small wallet, a little toiletries bag, and my husbands phone and wallet. No issues. Solid sturdy material. I’m y’all, 5’10” and wore it as a crossbody. Strap is long enough!
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a concert! I fit my wallet, phone, e-reader, a couple of lipglosses, compact and pack of gum in this bag. It is the perfect size for essentials and a couple of extras. Also adjusts to a really great length. I would absolutely buy it again for a daughter or friend.
customer_reviews.author: mefletch

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gameday Bag!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is perfect for carrying the essentials into the stadium. It will hold all of the basic items like wallet, keys, phone, etc. If you plan to take in water bottles, food etc it might night be big enough [I also bought the 12" x 12" one for those kinds of instances] but I love the size of this because it's not TOO big and I can wear it like a cross body bag
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Austin Isbell

customer_reviews.title: As Expected
customer_reviews.text: I just received this handbag and have not used it yet, but wanted to have it on hand for my community's clear bag policy in public venues. I'm sure it will be just what I need. It doesn't appear to be super durable but I don't intend to carry anything heavy in it so I'm sure it will be just fine. I would order it gain.
customer_reviews.author: Kim H

customer_reviews.title: It was perfect! Easy to go through the security line because ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to carry to a golf tournament. It was perfect! Easy to go through the security line because they can see what's in it without having to open it. It holds quite a bit too. I also have a attachment to hold a water bottle (bought at The Container Store) so it hooks right on it and didn't have to carry the water bottle around.
customer_reviews.author: Suzie Q

customer_reviews.title: Small enough for comfort and stylish for the stadium!
customer_reviews.text: Since there will be quite a few of us needing to carry a handbag into the stadium for an upcoming graduation I ordered one of these cross body clear bags for all of us. They have an outside pocket with velcro fasteners perfect for a phone. They're lightweight and comes in many different colors. The trim design won't be bulky seating in the seats and they're perfect for under a coat. BONUS they were here on time! Great customer service! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Wenzl

customer_reviews.title: Fashionable
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a clear fashionable bag to use when regular purses aren’t allowed. Will use it this week for the first time and I think it will work great. Looks like it is well made and should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix traveler

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter to use at the 2020 Winter Classic and it works great. It is sturdy and had room for her necessities. Went through security with no problem. With so many venues adopting a clear bag policy I'm sure it will get a lot of use!
customer_reviews.author: CPMom

customer_reviews.title: Sister loved it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag for my sister because she works on a cruise ship and must carry everything in a see-through bag. U bought her this one because it was well-priced and a good size. She loves the bag! The only reason I gave four stars is because there was a scuff/scratch type thing on the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Nat_G

customer_reviews.title: This bag was great..
customer_reviews.text: This bag was great... So far. Used it in conjunction with the "Clear 12x12x6 NFL stadium tote bag with side pocket" The outside pocket on this purse was great for phone access. Easy to see what you're looking for inside the purse. The clear plastic is very stiff. The zippers could be an issue so be careful. But much higher quality than the clear totes hip bag ( zipper broke 1st time I tried it! It's worth paying double+ for this purse over that purse!
customer_reviews.author: Sarina

customer_reviews.title: Will serve it's purpose for NFL games
customer_reviews.text: Didn't want to spend a lot on a bag that I will only use for our football games that had to meet certain requirements. This meets them for the NFL. Will hold my cell, keys and a small wallet and seems sturdy enough.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect item for no hassle entry into an event.
customer_reviews.text: I finally used my clear cross body purse for an inauguration and had no problems entering the facility. I was able to pack my small point and shoot camera, cell phone, charger cord, a wallet, tissue, small comb, gum and lip gloss all in the purse. I even packed a small portable fold up canvas bag inside the purse that I placed the clear purse in while on public transportation to the event because I didn't want to everyone on the bus checking out my items.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Clear Crossbody Messenger Shoulder Bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this purse, very easy to use. I took it to use during a concert at our local NFL stadium. This bag was awesome, went through security easily as they could see everything in bag. I highly recommend this bag.
customer_reviews.author: NitaK

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my daily essentials
customer_reviews.text: This cross-body purse is the perfect size... it isn't too bulky or too small for the items I need to take with me daily. I am able to carry a small zippered coach wallet, my reading glasses in their carry case, key chain with my vehicle key and it's entry remote and my house keys, a pack of e-cigarettes, a pair of gloves, my box cutter, a small coin purse and a small nail care bundle; and I still have room to put note papers and medication if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Only1Pooh

customer_reviews.title: Great bag and perfect for stadiums
customer_reviews.text: The clear crossbody bag was very well made. I was pleasantly surprised at how well it was made. The strap was substantial not flimsy. Really liked the outside pocket, it was perfect for my phone. I would definitely recommend buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for going to concerts at stadium
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag for a concert at a stadium. It held compact binoculars, a slim wallet, earplugs for three family members and various necessities (lip balm, facial tissues, etc). It's a plain plastic purse and there were some threads hanging loosely from the stitching, but I suspect it will be perfectly sufficient for my concert going.
customer_reviews.author: Sunflower Mama

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Concerts
customer_reviews.text: perfect for Concerts. I've been to 3 different concerts since buying this bag and I get through security fast. Only downside is that you can't really put anything because the plastic is really hard. you could probably only fit a cellphone and wallet but not a waterbottle.
customer_reviews.author: Adrianna

customer_reviews.title: Great small clear bag...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag to attend an event at a football stadium. It was the perfect size and I was able to pack all the items I needed. It was very lightweight and easy to carry. Perfect for any event where only clear bags are allowed.
customer_reviews.author: M Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag to carry to the Rolling Stones concert since that's all they allow now at most stadiums. It's larger than it looks and holds everything I needed to bring. It's functional and I will only carry it when needed.
customer_reviews.author: jolayne

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely Love this bag. It is the perfect size and ideal for going to the fair or a concert (the reason why I bought it). I am super happy with this purchase and would highly recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: What’s most important to know, the vinyl handbag was worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.text: The bag looked just like the picture, but my one and only dislike...the strap is really cheap. It’s flimsy, extremely lightweight and, not sturdy. After placing my items in the handbag it gave it weight to support the strap from falling off my shoulder. The strap supports best wearing it crossbody verses on one shoulder due to the flimsy material of the strap. Overall it served the purpose and afterall it’s vinyl. This bag should last me for awhile since I only need it on occasions that only allow clear handbags to be carried.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Was just the right size for me
customer_reviews.text: I bought to use for concerts since this is what a lot of venues are starting to require. Used it last night and my phone, keys, wristlet and kindle all fit with no problems or issues. It was exactly what I wanted. I had no issues with the seams or scratches on the plastic as other reviews had. I’m very happy with it so far. Will have to see if it holds up, but right now I don’t see any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: It's a perfect size to carry essentials and meets safety criteria
customer_reviews.text: I borrowed one to use in the Women's March on Washington. It's a perfect size to carry essentials and meets safety criteria. Great for travel, ball games, etc. Well made, so I bought a new one for my friend who loaned me hers and kept one for myself. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: terry palumbo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Some crossbody purses are just too small to fit everything in but this is the perfect size without being too big and bulky. I also love that it has an outside Velcro pocket for easy access.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stadium Approved
customer_reviews.text: I volunteer for an NPO a few times through out the year and no bags but clear are authorized. Some clear bags get through while others not. This one gave me no issues at the front. Would recommend for anyone who works for arenas or stadiums. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Issa

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use for game day
customer_reviews.text: I used this for a few football games and one concert. No problems at all! Easy to access everything, and it is made well to hold up to wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: Cornhusker country gurl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great bag to use when you're going to an event with security. You can put your necessary stuff in it and it makes it easier on the people checking bags. I like to use it during festival season.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for a concert/sporting event
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag after discovering that I would need to use a clear bag for a football game at a stadium. I have used it a few more times for concerts and the like. Very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for stadium security checkpoints
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly for a stadium concert. No issues at security checkpoints. It even fit the sweater I wore in then got too hot n stuffed it in the purse. Waterproof too...because someone spilled a beer on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Jane McCauley

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: This cross-body bag was a pleasant surprise. It’s sturdy and can fit a lot of stuff in it. It does feel kind of bulky when wearing however and that isn’t the greatest for me personally. But I recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great size and Sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I was going to an arena for a conference and wanted to be hands-free while abiding by the clear bag policy. It had enough room for everything I need and I liked that it was a thick material. I wore it has a crossbody. My fav part is the front section where you can have your phone and keys or whatever you need to have quick access to without having to unzip the whole bag. I just wish the strap was removable but it is adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Joi T

customer_reviews.title: Hit or miss?
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ordered A LOT of these bags (at least 15) and they’re kind of hit or miss. Sometimes they come perfect and clean, but other times they come with the straps sewn incorrectly or just very dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Great little bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag was perfect for use at my graduation ceremony. We were required to have a clear bag due to security issues. It fit nicely under my gown and was not visible. Was well made and a good size for everything I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Jennilyn

customer_reviews.title: Spacious for essentials
customer_reviews.text: Took this with me to conventions. I'm able to hold a battery pack, phone, wallet, earphones, business cards, snacks, and makeup. Was able to get through bag-check lines so quickly. I'll also be taking this with me to theme parks as it's fairly waterproof. :)
customer_reviews.author: Noé Sue

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: Bag is much smaller in person. I’m 5’5 and average weight, and the strap is not long enough to be cross body on me. Very cheap material and wil not fit a small Bible and journal in it. I bought it for a youth trip at an arena. Depending on what you need it for, those are all important things to note.
customer_reviews.author: Pattsy

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for stadium use
customer_reviews.text: This bag seems to be a perfect fit for my wife. We purchased one to start the NFL season and found it to be just what she needed. Big enough for a standard size wallet and extras with the an outside pocket for easy access to season ticket passes, etc. We recently lent it to a friend and they loved it as well. So much so, they kept it. We purchased another one. It's durable, zippers are good and the strap is long enough to wear it over your shoulder.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for games
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bag for sporting venues with clear bag policies. Nice size and holds a good amount of game day necessities.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: NFL Game Day Ready
customer_reviews.text: This purse was very sturdy and fit all my essentials in it for the game. No problem getting through security. Draped it across me with no worries. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: DaShawn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I love being able to take this to sporting events that require clear bags. It is cross body, so it's easy to stay in control of it and I like that there is more than one pocket. I can even leave my phone in the front pocket and read my texts through the side.
customer_reviews.author: Donna L

customer_reviews.title: I superglued it back onto the plastic and it's just fine.
customer_reviews.text: This bag will do the trick. I'm going to a concert at a football stadium and need it for the event. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is because there were a lot of excess strings from the stitching (which I wouldn't notice if the bag wasn't clear) and one of the small velcro pieces on the front pocket came off when I opened it. I superglued it back onto the plastic and it's just fine.
customer_reviews.author: JMegan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for NFL-property rules!
customer_reviews.text: I had to get a clear purse for attending a concert at an NFL field. This seems sturdy and well-made, perfect size for phone, keys, etc. I've actually loaned it out to friends also needing one for such events and it's still holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: T.C.

customer_reviews.title: Got the job done.
customer_reviews.text: Stadiums are 100% eforcing their clear bags/bag size policies. This came in super handy this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with this
customer_reviews.text: Great bag for sporting events where you need a clear bag. Fits a decent amount of stuff - for sure your phone, gum, chap-stick, sunglasses, tissues, on and on....roomy for a bunch of stuff that aren't huge items.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this 3 yrs ago and it still look brand new. It’s perfect taking to stadiums where I can’t carry my regular purse.
customer_reviews.author: Tanna Wall

customer_reviews.title: Staylist and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for football events. Needed this bag to enter NFL stadium and is stylist & just the right size. I took NFL stick on decal to make it stand out event more. Not to big or too smal. The zipper is strong and so is the plastic. Not cheap looking or feel at all.
customer_reviews.author: YES Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Looks like it will work great
customer_reviews.text: This clear bag seems to be just what I needed for attending a college football game. It's within the size guidelines and it will hold everything that I will need to have with me. I will only bring the essentials but I think this is going to work great!
customer_reviews.author: PcolaGramma

customer_reviews.title: GREAT !!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s exactly what it describes to be , I can’t wait to use it for my BTS MOTS tour when it’s rescheduled. It’s not to big and not to small.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: had to throw it away at the gates
customer_reviews.text: got all the way to Beaver Stadium and was told I could not enter because the bag had a "flat bottom"
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha

customer_reviews.title: perfect size
customer_reviews.text: this was perfect for the football game. I was able to put everything I needed into it.
customer_reviews.author: CLC

customer_reviews.title: Was fine for keys
customer_reviews.text: It came flattened, so a few days before our trip I stuffed it with towels to poof it out. Was fine for keys, fone, wallet and program but not much else. The strap is shorter than expected...almost a crossbody depending on your size. Was kind of a hassle to get into. Probably just throw everything in my pockets next time we go to a game.
customer_reviews.author: Sassy Pants

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, sturdy bag.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for concerts and football games. I can fit all I need inside. Great little bag and 100% worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer Sarah S

customer_reviews.title: Too small for me
customer_reviews.text: Was disappointed with this purchase. I bought it sight unseen and it appeared to be larger online than it actually was when it arrived. It has no use for me and I really don't know how anyone could actually use this for going to an event. A total waste of my hard-earned money.
customer_reviews.author: Ker Garin

customer_reviews.title: The Quality is excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I love my clear cross body purse. I wore it to a sports event. It made security very eady💖
customer_reviews.author: Mashona Brooks-Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Use this for work and the straps really hold up on this bag unlike some of the similar clear bags u can find on amazon
customer_reviews.author: tara b

customer_reviews.title: Great size! Perfect for sporting events
customer_reviews.text: Great size! Perfect for sporting events, concerts, etc in venues where regular bags are not allowed. The adjustable straps and outside velcro pocket are nice. Well worth every penny to be able to take the most essential items with you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small clear baf
customer_reviews.text: I have not used the bag yet but it seems like it will be perfect for a concert.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon CustomerJennyT

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag!
customer_reviews.text: So far this bag has been great! I have gone to three events that the venues requires clear bag. I can fit everything I need in it. I would definitely recommend it to others!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley McClure

customer_reviews.title: Great purse!
customer_reviews.text: Love this purse! Lots of room, but not roo big! I ordered this after10 PM on a Thursday night and it arrived around 10 am Saturday morning, just in time for me leave for the event I was attending! I would definitely recommend this purse!
customer_reviews.author: booklover44

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves this bag.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for concerts and venues that require clear bags. Has 2 pockets. It really worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: It’s alright but....
customer_reviews.text: I was planning to use this crossbody for the upcoming BTS World Tour so I was a little excited to receive it. The bag looked great and it arrived fast but upon further inspection,I noticed it was coming apart from the bottom corner... It also had a strong plastic smell when opened but I let it air out for a few days so it’s okay now. I would’ve rated 5 stars if it wasn’t for the seams coming apart..
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I volunteer at a state correctional facility that not only requires clear bags but there cannot be any metal on the bag as well because as volunteers we must pass through a metal detector. The clips on this bag are a sturdy high grade plastic as is the bag itself. I'm very happy with this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Quality Clear Bag
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag for my fiance since our local football team implemented a clear bag policy starting this season. When she received it she immediately tried to make sure she could fit all of her essentials into the bag, which she was able to with plenty of room to spare! The bag seems very sturdy and well constructed. We will see how it holds up on gameday weekends this fall.
customer_reviews.author: BigBen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for stadiums or events
customer_reviews.text: With so many stadiums and events requiring clear bags or purses, this bag was perfect. It fit all that I needed and had room for more. I had my wallet, phone, snacks, sunglasses and more. Would definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Mary K

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Very good size, stitching sturdy, strap comfortable, really like the extra pouch in front for cell phone
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey ogrody

customer_reviews.title: Must have for concerts and sporting events.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use at a concert that required clear bags. I searched all over and wanted a plain cross body bag and this fit the bill. It is well within guidelines for stadiums so that's a major plus. I carried a minimal amount of stuff so this bag was perfect for me. It held up without any problems and has since become my go to bag for any event requiring clear bags. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten P.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I needed this for a concert where they only allowed clear bags. It was the perfect size and light. I was able to carry my phone, wallet and a charger without struggling to fit things in. Good materia alsol. I took it with me out the next day to the movies because of how comfy it was and easy to carry a couple of things instead of purse.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Too Small
customer_reviews.text: It was actually too small. It is stadium approved like they said, but couldn't get enough in it and had to borrow another bag.
customer_reviews.author: B. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great for stadiums
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as shown. Purchased for a concert at a stadium and it was great.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Herman

customer_reviews.title: Defective Strap and Pocket Flap
customer_reviews.text: I returned mine. The strap was twisted. Since it was sewn, i couldn't fix it. The flap of the pocket was sewn crookedly.
customer_reviews.author: Ima Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Love it 😊
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag, because of my job and no longer have to have my pocketbooks game and when I enter my workplace. I just hold it up to the guard can see it and I’m on my way. It’s big enough for me to hold my make up my wallet my Vape and car keys
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for concerts and sporting events
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for concerts and sports events that require clear bags. Love the extra side pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Shari Bitterman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for taking to NFL games
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for taking to NFL games. Fits lots of stuff without being massive. The front pouch is very useful for smaller items.
customer_reviews.author: Jamille2

customer_reviews.title: solved security problems.
customer_reviews.text: The perfect size for concerts and sports events when security wants to see inside your handbag
customer_reviews.author: johnlenane

customer_reviews.title: Cute smallish bag
customer_reviews.text: This light weight crossbody fits a lot of stuff. For those wondering, it does NOT have an odor.
customer_reviews.author: Robin in TN

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Purchased for my daughter attending a concert where you cannot bring in a purse. This complied with the regulations and was the perfect choice. Others asked where she got it
customer_reviews.author: BLC

product_meta.title: Clear Crossbody Messenger Shoulder Bag with Zipper Closure Adjustable Strap NFL Stadium Approved Clear Bags For Women and Men
product_meta.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :8 x 3 x 8 inches; 6.4 Ounces
 * Department :Sports and Outdoors
 * Date First Available :September 13, 2013
 * Manufacturer :Clear Handbags & More
 * ASIN :B00ED10P16

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #15,533 in Sports & Outdoors (See Top 100 in Sports & Outdoors)  *  #90 inWomen's Crossbody Handbags 
    *  #120 inWomen's Shoulder Handbags 
    *  #88 inWomen's Tote Handbags 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.6 out of 5 stars1,661 ratings
feature_bullets: STADIUM APPROVED CLEAR BAGS - CHM raises the bar on clear bags for football games! These bags meet NFL, NCAA, NBA, NHL, concert/festival/event, & PGA Tour security policy for carrying everyday items.

DURABLE, BUILT TO LAST CONSTRUCTION - Our clear stadium purse is made of heavy duty, strong 5mil PVC. This clear messenger bag with shoulder strap has a zipper closure and a Velcro pocket in the front.

CERTIFIED BPA FREE AND LEAD FREE TRANSPARENT BAGS - Don’t risk your health with other clear plastic tote bags! This transparent purse measures 8"W x 8"H x 3"D and features a 29-inch to 58-inch adjustable shoulder strap.
WATERPROOF AND DRY. CHM's water resistant clear vinyl bag cleans easily and will help keep your gear safe. Can be worn over your shoulder or across your body. Sized right for kids and adults alike.

100% MONEY-BACK GUARANTEE! At Clear Handbags & More we fully stand behind our products. Try our stadium bags and see the difference for yourself. If you are not completely satisfied with our clear crossbody purse, we will gladly give you your money back, no questions asked!
